document.full_text: when virginia commonwealth lost in the colonial athletic association tournament final, coach shaka sharp did not argue that his team deserved an n.c.a.a. berth.
document.title: v.c.u. capitalizes on chance it wasn't sure it would get
lines_and_colors: when virginia commonwealth lost in the colonial athletic association tournament final, coach shaka sharp did not argue that his team deserved an n.c.a.a. berth.
